metadata.title: CVE-2018-16425 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A double free when handling responses from an HSM Card insc_pkcs15emu_sc_hsm_init in libopensc/pkcs15-sc-hsm.c in OpenSC before0.19.0-rc1 could be used by attackers able to supply crafted smartcards tocause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecifiedother impact.

criterions.comment: opensc: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
